nodes.text: The Immunity D-package enhanced the wearer's nervous system in such a way as to prevent physical immobilization or the loss of consciousness due to sensory overload. The technology of D-Package implants had the consequence of rendering them larger and more intrusive than other types. Thus, they tended to have more impressive effects, but could only be used by very healthy individuals.
In the game, the playable character must have a constitution attribute of 18 or higher.
